subject: Re: The usual stuff
author: mrscaptainjack2
full_text:
Frank, have you tried asking this entity who tells you this doomsday stuff to go toward the light?  Or otherwise leave you alone?  I'm wondering if he/she/it is hogging the spotlight and not letting anyone else through.  That time I was getting bullshit answers from "Steve," and my Uncle Red came through, I swear I heard someone say, "Get away from me" -- as if Red was trying to talk, and Steve was getting in the way somehow.  Just a thought:  maybe your guys are keeping more desirable contact with benevolent entities at bay.  (Like I know anything, I'm a newbie! Feel free to ignore my posts!  But I just feel so bad for you, that you keep getting all this doomsday stuff.)

Jill





--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:
>
>  Went on one of the ghost hunts on the Queen may, but I don't get anything
> related to tat stuff, I get this stuff--everywhere.  I have my doubts about
> it beng true, maybe just fear junk from some level. I was using the 12-470
> hackie shack, and wouyld get littel burst of FM when I went by a window or
> outside door.
> 
>  Frank-S
>
